item.title: Notes: What is an expert student?
item.description: References Citekey: @sternberg2003expert Sternberg, R. J. (2003). What is an “expert student?” Educational Researcher, 32(8), 5–9. Notes Sternberg discusses the notion of teaching for expertise''. He argues thatwe need to identify expertise in a way that is closely aligned with the way experts are identified in the disciplines students study” (p. 5). In his framework of successful intelligence'', he highlights three dimensions of teaching to help children think in ways characteristic of experts in a variety of disciplines.
